info.name: Complex Square Roots By RikR
info.description: Complex Square Roots by Rik Riesmeijer, original in 159 characters.

renderpass.code:
void mainImage(out vec4 r, in vec2 z) {               // Complex Square Roots.
    z = z / iResolution.xy - 0.5;                     // Center and scale.
    r.z = -(r.x = sqrt(length(z /= 2.0) + z.x));      // Root Re parts.
    r.w = -(r.y = sign(z.y) * sqrt(length(z) - z.x)); // Root Im parts.
    r = fract(iTime + 8.0 * r);                       // Animate colors.
}                                                     // By Rik Riesmeijer.
                                                      // No rights reserved.
renderpass.name: Image
